short.ar: مع Eye-Able® يمكنك رؤية أي موقع بالطريقة التي تريدها.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Eye-Able® will let you see any website the way you need to.
short.cs: S Eye-Able® můžete vidět jakoukoli webovou stránku tak, jak ji potřebujete.
short.da: Med Eye-Able® er du i stand til at se enhver hjemmeside, som du har brug for den.
short.de: Mit Eye-Able® bist Du in der Lage, jede Website so zu sehen, wie Du es brauchst.
short.el: Με το Eye-Able® μπορείτε να δείτε οποιονδήποτε ιστότοπο όπως τον χρειάζεστε.
short.es: Con Eye-Able® puede ver cualquier sitio web de la forma que lo necesite.
short.et: Eye-Able® abil näete iga veebisaiti nii, nagu vajate.
short.fi: Eye-Able® avulla näet minkä tahansa sivuston haluamallasi tavalla.
short.fr: Avec Eye-Able®, vous pouvez voir n'importe quel site Web comme vous en avez besoin.
short.hi: Eye-Able® के साथ आप किसी भी वेबसाइट को अपनी जरूरत के अनुसार देख सकते हैं।
short.id: Dengan Eye-Able® Anda dapat melihat situs web apa pun sesuai kebutuhan Anda.
short.it: Con Eye-Able® puoi vedere qualsiasi sito web nel modo che desideri.
short.ja: Eye-Able®を使用すると、必要な方法で任意のWebサイトを表示できます。
short.ko: Eye-Able®을 사용하면 원하는 방식으로 모든 웹사이트를 볼 수 있습니다.
short.lt: Naudodami Eye-Able® galėsite matyti bet kurią svetainę taip, kaip jums reikia.
short.lv: Izmantojot Eye-Able®, jūs varat redzēt jebkuru vietni tā, kā tas jums nepieciešams.
short.ms: Dengan Eye-Able® anda boleh melihat mana-mana tapak web mengikut cara yang anda perlukan.
short.nl: Met Eye-Able® kunt u elke website zien zoals u hem nodig hebt.
short.no: Eye-Able® lar deg se alle nettsider slik du trenger.
short.pl: Dzięki Eye-Able® możesz zobaczyć dowolną stronę internetową tak, jak tego potrzebujesz.
short.ru: С Eye-Able® вы можете видеть любой веб-сайт так, как вам нужно.
short.sk: S Eye-Able® môžete vidieť akúkoľvek webovú stránku podľa vašich potrieb.
short.sv: Med Eye-Able® kan du se vilken webbplats som helst som du behöver den.
short.tr: Eye-Able® ile herhangi bir web sitesini ihtiyaç duyduğunuz şekilde görebilirsiniz.
short.uk: З Eye-Able® ви можете переглядати будь-який веб-сайт так, як вам це потрібно.

long.ar,fi,id,ja,ko,lt,lv,ms:
★ 𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗳𝘂𝗹 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂?
Eye-Able® is a Chrome extension whose large variety of features allows you to customize any website according to your needs with one click. We want you to see every website exactly the way you need to. 
All people should have easy and barrier-free access to information on the internet.

★ 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗶𝗹𝘆 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗘𝘆𝗲-𝗔𝗯𝗹𝗲®?
We make websites visible, readable and therefore accessible. With Eye-Able® you can configure every website according to your very own needs. Visual impairments, including color deficiencies and other visual limitations can be compensated for by customizing the content elements as desired. For this purpose we have developed a contrast mode, intelligent font enlargement, a screen reader and several other features.

★ 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
✓ Font enlargement
Unlike the normal browser zoom, the intelligent Eye-Able® zoom offers you the possibility to enjoy a website in the same design, only with a larger font. To put it simply: Our zoom recognizes which content should be enlarged, and how much. The original page layout remains the same, but you can read the content with ease.

✓ Contrast mode
In our numerous interviews with users with visual disabilities, we learned which contrast combinations allow the most accessible view. We provide these modes to our users as options for background and font color. You can configure both the foreground and the background of every website just as you need it.

✓ Intuitive screen reader (audio output)
With our intuitive “read-aloud” function you can simply have the text content read to you. You are able to choose which content shall be read, or you can just listen to the whole page at once.

✓ Navigation via keyboard
In combination with our friendly audio output you can browse the internet without using a mouse or a screen. You can decide yourself which content you want to navigate via your keyboard.

★ 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗮 𝗴𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲:
✓ Color deficiency compensation (red/green/blue deficiencies, as well as other contrast and color gradation modes)
✓ Intelligent blue filter according to position of the sun and time of the day
✓ Magnifier
✓ Hiding all images and animations
✓ Night mode
✓ Enlarged mouse pointer
✓ Accessible fonts for every website

In total, you have over 22 features available to make the internet more accessible for you.

For an extensive test of our tool, we provide our pro version free of charge for a limited period of time. You can use the full version 30 days after your installation. (By the way, the full version does not even cost 2 € per month.)

★ 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻:
✓ Tab navigation
✓ Font enlargement
✓ Night mode
✓ Blue filter

★ 𝗪𝗵𝗼 𝗯𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗘𝘆𝗲-𝗔𝗯𝗹𝗲®?
Accessibility is beneficial to many, for example:
✓ Those with visual impairments
✓ Those with learning disabilities
✓ The elderly
✓ Those who surf online a lot

★ 𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗲𝘁 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗼 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁?
It is our vision to reduce the barriers on the internet significantly. This is exactly why we have developed our tool. In future, its range of features will continue to grow steadily, and of course your license includes all further updates!

𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗻𝘂𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗼𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮 𝗱𝗲𝗺𝗼𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹 𝗮𝘁:
eye-able.com 
Stop by and give it a try!

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁:
If you have any questions, we are happy to help – just drop us a line at support@eye-able.com
Support:  https://eye-able.com/support

long.de:
★ 𝗪𝗮𝗿𝘂𝗺 𝗗𝘂 𝗱𝗶𝗲𝘀𝗲 𝗘𝗿𝘄𝗲𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘂𝗻𝗴 𝗯𝗿𝗮𝘂𝗰𝗵𝘀𝘁?
Eye-Able® ist eine Chrome-Erweiterung, die dir durch eine Vielzahl von Features erlaubt, jede Website mit einem Klick an deine Bedürfnisse anzupassen. Unsere Vision ist es, dass du jede Website genau so sehen kannst, wie du es brauchst. 

Alle Menschen sollten einen problemlosen und freien Zugang zu Informationen im Internet erhalten.

★ 𝗪𝗶𝗲 𝗱𝘂 𝗱𝗮𝗻𝗸 𝗘𝘆𝗲-𝗔𝗯𝗹𝗲® 𝗕𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗻 𝗹𝗲𝗶𝗰𝗵𝘁𝗲𝗿 ü𝗯𝗲𝗿𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗲𝘀𝘁?
Wir machen Webseiten sichtbar, lesbar und damit auch erlebbar. Mit Eye-Able® kannst Du  jede Website an deine jeweiligen individuellen Bedürfnisse anpassen. Sehschwächen, einschließlich Farbschwächen sowie weitere visuelle Einschränkungen können durch eine Individualisierung der Inhaltselemente ganz nach Wunsch ausgeglichen werden. Dafür haben wir unter anderem einen Kontrastmodus, intelligente Schriftvergrößerung und einen Screen-Reader entwickelt.

★ 𝗪𝗶𝗰𝗵𝘁𝗶𝗴𝗲 𝗞𝗲𝗿𝗻-𝗙𝘂𝗻𝗸𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗲𝗻:
✔ Schriftvergrößerung
Anders als mit dem normalen Browser-Zoom, bietet Dir der intelligente Eye-Able®-Zoom die Möglichkeit, eine Website im gleichen Design, nur mit größerer Schrift zu genießen. Im Klartext: Unser Zoom erkennt, welche Inhalte wie stark vergrößert werden sollten. So bleibt das ursprüngliche Layout der Seite bestehen und du kannst die Inhalte dennoch gut lesen.

✔ Kontrastmodus
Durch eine Vielzahl an Interviews konnten verschiedene Kontrastkombinationen ausgemacht werden, welche eine möglichst barrierefreie Ansicht erreichen. Diese Kombinationen stellen wir unseren User*innen als Möglichkeiten für Hintergrund- und Schriftfarbe zu Verfügung. So kannst Du Vorder- und Hintergrund jeder Website individuell einstellen, genauso, wie du es gerade brauchst.

✔ Intuitiver Screen-Reader (Tonausgabe)
Mit unserer intuitiven Vorlese-Funktion bist du in der Lage, Textinhalte einfach vorlesen zu lassen. Du kannst selbst bestimmen, welche Inhalte Dir vorgelesen werden sollen oder einfach die ganze Seite auf einmal anhören. 

✔ Navigation via Tastatur
In Verbindung mit unserer freundlichen Tonausgabe bist Du in der Lage, das Internet ohne Maus oder Bildschirm zu bedienen. Du kannst hierbei selbst wählen, durch welche Inhalte Du via Tastatur navigieren willst.

★ 𝗪𝗲𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝗻𝗸𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝗺 Ü𝗯𝗲𝗿𝗯𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗸:
✔ Farbschwächen-Kompensation (Rot-/Grün-/Blau-Schwäche sowie weitere Kontrast- und Farbstufen-Modi)
✔ Intelligenter Blaufilter nach Sonnenstand und Uhrzeit
✔ Lupenfunktion
✔ Alle Bilder und Animationen ausblenden
✔ Nachtmodus 
✔ Vergrößerter Maus-Zeiger
✔ Barrierefreie Schriftart für jede Website 

Insgesamt stehen Dir über 22 Funktionen zum Thema Barrierefreiheit im Internet zu Verfügung.

Damit du unser Tool ausgiebig testen kannst, stellen wir dir unsere Pro-Version für einen begrenzten Zeitraum auch kostenlos zu Verfügung. Du kannst die Vollversion 30 Tage nach deiner Installation nutzen.

Eye-Able® is a Chrome extension whose large variety of features allows you to customize any website according to your needs with one click. We want you to see every website exactly the way you need to. 
All people should have easy and barrier-free access to information on the internet.

★ 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗶𝗹𝘆 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗘𝘆𝗲-𝗔𝗯𝗹𝗲®?
We make websites visible, readable and therefore accessible. With Eye-Able® you can configure every website according to your very own needs. Visual impairments, including color deficiencies and other visual limitations can be compensated for by customizing the content elements as desired. For this purpose we have developed a contrast mode, intelligent font enlargement, a screen reader and several other features.

★ 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
✓ Font enlargement
Unlike the normal browser zoom, the intelligent Eye-Able® zoom offers you the possibility to enjoy a website in the same design, only with a larger font. To put it simply: Our zoom recognizes which content should be enlarged, and how much. The original page layout remains the same, but you can read the content with ease.

✓ Contrast mode
In our numerous interviews with users with visual disabilities, we learned which contrast combinations allow the most accessible view. We provide these modes to our users as options for background and font color. You can configure both the foreground and the background of every website just as you need it.

✓ Intuitive screen reader (audio output)
With our intuitive “read-aloud” function you can simply have the text content read to you. You are able to choose which content shall be read, or you can just listen to the whole page at once.

✓ Navigation via keyboard
In combination with our friendly audio output you can browse the internet without using a mouse or a screen. You can decide yourself which content you want to navigate via your keyboard.

★ 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗮 𝗴𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲:
✓ Color deficiency compensation (red/green/blue deficiencies, as well as other contrast and color gradation modes)
✓ Intelligent blue filter according to position of the sun and time of the day
✓ Magnifier
✓ Hiding all images and animations
✓ Night mode
✓ Enlarged mouse pointer
✓ Accessible fonts for every website

In total, you have over 22 features available to make the internet more accessible for you.

For an extensive test of our tool, we provide our pro version free of charge for a limited period of time. You can use the full version 30 days after your installation. (By the way, the full version does not even cost 2 € per month.)

★ 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻:
✓ Tab navigation
✓ Font enlargement
✓ Night mode
✓ Blue filter

★ 𝗪𝗵𝗼 𝗯𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗘𝘆𝗲-𝗔𝗯𝗹𝗲®?
Accessibility is beneficial to many, for example:
✓ Those with visual impairments
✓ Those with learning disabilities
✓ The elderly
✓ Those who surf online a lot

★ 𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗲𝘁 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗼 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁?

★ 𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗳𝘂𝗹 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂?
Eye-Able® is a Chrome extension whose large variety of features allows you to customize any website according to your needs with one click. We want you to see every website exactly the way you need to. 
All people should have easy and barrier-free access to information on the internet.

★ 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗶𝗹𝘆 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗘𝘆𝗲-𝗔𝗯𝗹𝗲®?
We make websites visible, readable and therefore accessible. With Eye-Able® you can configure every website according to your very own needs. Visual impairments, including color deficiencies and other visual limitations can be compensated for by customizing the content elements as desired. For this purpose we have developed a contrast mode, intelligent font enlargement, a screen reader and several other features.

★ 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
✓ Font enlargement
Unlike the normal browser zoom, the intelligent Eye-Able® zoom offers you the possibility to enjoy a website in the same design, only with a larger font. To put it simply: Our zoom recognizes which content should be enlarged, and how much. The original page layout remains the same, but you can read the content with ease.

✓ Contrast mode
In our numerous interviews with users with visual disabilities, we learned which contrast combinations allow the most accessible view. We provide these modes to our users as options for background and font color. You can configure both the foreground and the background of every website just as you need it.

✓ Intuitive screen reader (audio output)
With our intuitive “read-aloud” function you can simply have the text content read to you. You are able to choose which content shall be read, or you can just listen to the whole page at once.

✓ Navigation via keyboard
In combination with our friendly audio output you can browse the internet without using a mouse or a screen. You can decide yourself which content you want to navigate via your keyboard.

★ 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗮 𝗴𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲:
✓ Color deficiency compensation (red/green/blue deficiencies, as well as other contrast and color gradation modes)
✓ Intelligent blue filter according to position of the sun and time of the day
✓ Magnifier
✓ Hiding all images and animations
✓ Night mode
✓ Enlarged mouse pointer
✓ Accessible fonts for every website

In total, you have over 22 features available to make the internet more accessible for you.

For an extensive test of our tool, we provide our pro version free of charge for a limited period of time. You can use the full version 30 days after your installation.

★ 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻:
✓ Tab navigation
✓ Font enlargement
✓ Night mode
✓ Blue filter
